Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Given its exceptional quality and the effort put into its development, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its true worth and the value it can bring to you, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $7500. I trust this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the immense value it holds for someone like you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
